name: A lot of jumps
description:
Made in a team of 2:

Mathias Wagner Nielsen (programming/design)

Simon Valdemar Weber (design/audio) @SimonVWebs

How fast can you complete our very short platformer?

INPUTS:

WASD/Arrow keys (Can't jump on up-key tho)

R to restart level

There might be controller support

5 levels, after last level it goes back to first.

--- We intended to do alot more levels, but ran out of time :)
